text: Juan Carlos Caballero Vega (June 24, 1900 – March 30, 2010) was a Mexican revolutionary. Caballero worked as the personal driver and chauffeur for Mexican Revolutionary general Pancho Villa for more than two years. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:2010 deaths Category:People of the Mexican Revolution Category:People from Chihuahua (state) Category:People from Monterrey Category:Mexican centenarians
